name: Tikaondotnet
body:
### Tika On DotNet
This project is a wrapper around the wonderful [Tika](http://tika.apache.org/) library written in Java making it usable by .Net applications.

This may sound scary and heretical but did you know it is possible to leverage Java libraries from .Net applications with no TCP sockets or web services getting caught in the crossfire? [IKVM](http://www.ikvm.net/) baby!

For more details checkout [this blog post](http://www.dovetailsoftware.com/blogs/kmiller/archive/2010/07/02/using-the-tika-java-library-in-your-net-application-with-ikvm) from @KevM

### Cloning 

```
$ git clone git@github.com:KevM/tikaondotnet.git
$ cd tikadotnet
```

### Authors and Contributors
This project was created by @KevM to support a project created by @DovetailSoftware. 

### Support or Contact
If you have any problems. Create an issue and we can talk about it.
tagline: How to use Tika on .Net via IKVM
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
